title: An Approach on HIV Infection
content: Pathogenesis of the connection of HIV-infection and cancer is a nowadays problem for research. More important is also to take into consideration a complexity of abordasions, such as  prevention, diagnosis, monitoring, treatment, including control measures. These should be supported by statistical studies that report on restricted or extended geographical areas, to the level of social class and age. In our written text we try to describe  from our opinion, strategies in HIV, infection a social and a healthcare problem.
